basics.summary: Passionate Computer Science student specializing in AI, machine learning, and full-stack development. Skilled in building intelligent systems, automation tools, and scalable applications integrating NLP and deep learning models.

work.name: United International University
work.summary: Assessing students based on their assignments.

projects.name: Autonomous Car Parking System
projects.summary: Built a reinforcement learning-based self-driving car simulation in Unity and deployed it to a real-world Arduino vehicle via custom REST APIs.
highlights: Trained an RL agent to perform autonomous parking tasks.
Integrated simulation control with hardware deployment.
Awarded 3rd runner-up among 100+ teams at UIU Project Show, Summer 2024.

projects.name: OptiTask - Personal Management System
projects.summary: Developed a task automation and emotion-aware productivity app with group chat, smart task assignment, and AI-driven support.
highlights: Integrated a ChatBot using the Gemini API with Stanford NLP for user emotion analysis and personalized responses.
Implemented real-time collaboration using React, Node.js, and Socket.io.
Won 1st place (Poster Category) out of 150+ teams at UIU Fall Project Show 2024.

projects.name: VoteChain - Blockchain Based Voting System
projects.summary: Building a decentralized voting platform with wallet authentication, real-time voting logic, and secure smart contract execution.
highlights: Implemented real-time vote validation with Solidity and custom APIs.
Using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Web3.js for frontend and blockchain integration.

projects.name: EngReji - AI Powered Learning Platform
projects.summary: Developed a learning platform that empowers rural Bangladeshi students to improve spoken English through real-time AI feedback on pronunciation and fluency.
highlights: Designed the frontend with TypeScript & Tailwind CSS and built a scalable Python backend integrated with advanced open-source AI models and APIs for speech analysis.
Performed functionality and regression testing during development to ensure consistent performance across modules.
Achieved National and International recognition: Finalist in Bangladesh Blockchain Olympiad 2025 (AI Category), as well as Honorable Mention, and shortlisted at JavaAIFest (powered by TherapBD).
